info.name: School SaaS API
info.description: Complete API collection - Auth, Setup Wizard, Super Admin, School Profile, Classes, Teachers, Academic, Students Admin, Admin App, Student App, Teacher App

body.raw:
{
  "type": "notice",
  "title": "School Holiday Announcement",
  "content": "School will be closed on Friday for annual day celebration",
  "target": "all",
  "priority": "high"
}

{
  "recipientId": "{{studentId}}",
  "recipientType": "student",
  "subject": "Assignment Reminder",
  "message": "Please submit your assignment by tomorrow",
  "priority": "normal"
}
